page.title: 10Interviews:local residents
page.content:
Lady Margaret Fortescue interview continued. 80 boys lodged at the house and the masters lodged in the village. As a child her favourite sweets were peppermint creams and she got a shilling a week pocket money. Her hobbies are riding and hunting.
Mr. Tucker Mr. Tucker has been living in the area for over 80 years. His house is about 300 years old. He went to Filleigh school when he was young. He did not have a favourite subject but was hopeless at maths and scripture. In the playground they played marbles, tops, leapfrog and hoops. In Filleigh there were 95 children. The teachers were Mr. Reeves and Mr. Westwood.
